name: Heroes Blood: Brothers in Arms
description:
“Great game if you liked the game Blood Brothers”
“Amazing game!! Definitely a game you should try out”
“Fantastic...period”

Build your team of Heroes to fight in distant lands and battlegrounds. Live your final fantasy! This Legendary multiplayer RPG lets you choose your team, level up your heroes and set them to battle. Smash your way through orcs, dragons, soul knights and many more monsters!

Tired of adventuring? Try your luck against other players in PvP battles.

Ready to brave the caves, beaches, mountains and deserts with all the monsters they hold? Then play Heroes of Blood.

Features include:

Create or Join a Guild with other players
Build your party from millions of combinations
Upgrade and refine your Heroes
World map to quest and adventure
Player Vs player battles
Boss battles
And much more


Heroes of Blood is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. Also, downloading this game you agree with our terms & conditions including that you are at least 13 years of age to download or play Heroes of Blood.
